original_text: I raised my eyes and saw, and behold, a ram standing on the bank of the canal. It had two horns, and both horns were high, but one was higher than the other, and the higher one came up last.
korean_text: 내가 눈을 들어 본즉 강 가에 두 뿔 가진 숫양이 섰는데 그 두 뿔이 다 길었으며 그 중 한 뿔은 다른 뿔보다 길었고 그 긴 것은 나중에 난 것이더라

sentences.original_text: I raised my eyes and saw
a ram standing on the bank of the canal
but one was higher than the other
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 한쪽은 다른 쪽보다 더 높았다

sentences.original_text: and the higher one came up last
sentences.korean_translation: 더 높은 그 뿔은 나중에 솟아났다
